text: Soni Allah an’gumbile jenumanja kuumila mwitaka, kaneka kuumila mwindondwa lya mesi (gaŵalume ni ŵakongwe), kaneka am’bisile kuŵa ŵamitundu jiŵili (achalume ni achakongwe). Jwankongwe jwalijose jwangajigala chiilu kapena kuŵeleka, ikaŵeje kwa umanyilisi Ŵakwe (Allah). Ni ngakasapedwaga umi welewu nkupedwa umi welewu, kapena (jwine) kupungusyidwa mu umi wakwe, ikaŵeje (ipali yosopeyo) m’Chitabu (Cha Al-Lauh Al-Mahfȗz), chisimu yalakweyo kwa Allah iŵele yakwepepala kusyene
